\section{Module hal.ml.models.time\_series}

    \label{hal:ml:models:time_series}
\begin{alltt}
Multi-purpose prediction methods to be used in time-series. 
\end{alltt}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

    \label{hal:ml:models:time_series:arma}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.models \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.models.time\_series \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.models.time\_series.arma \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{arma}(\textit{dates}, \textit{values}, \textit{start}={\tt None}, \textit{end}={\tt None}, \textit{plot}={\tt False})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}
Predict days values using ARMA algorithm.
:param dates: list of str date
:param values: list of float values
:param start: start predicting in this day
:param end: end of prediction
:param plot: whether to plot or not values in graph 
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}

    \label{hal:ml:models:time_series:arima}
    \index{hal \textit{(package)}!hal.ml \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.models \textit{(package)}!hal.ml.models.time\_series \textit{(module)}!hal.ml.models.time\_series.arima \textit{(function)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{arima}(\textit{dates}, \textit{values}, \textit{start}={\tt None}, \textit{end}={\tt None})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
\begin{alltt}
Predict days values using ARIMA algorithm.
:param dates: list of str date
:param values: list of float values
:param start: start predicting in this day
:param end: end of prediction 
\end{alltt}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
